text: Taselisib (development code: GDC-0032) is an experimental cancer drug in development by Roche. It is a small molecule inhibitor targeting the p110α protein product of the phosphoinositide 3-kinase gene, PIK3CA. Taselisib is in phase III clinical trials for treatment of metastatic breast cancer ("Sandpiper") and non-small cell lung cancer ("Lung-MAP"). ==References== Category:Experimental cancer drugs Category:Phosphoinositide 3-kinase inhibitors Category:Propionamides Category:Benzoxazepines
title: Taselisib
